```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
trashweheel_df = 
  read_xlsx(
    "./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
    range = cell_cols("A:N")) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na(dumpster)
  mutate(
    sports_balls = round(sports_balls)
  )
```
